title: My reaction when all chat arguments devolve to, "i didt now u wer such a bronzie"

replies.body:
Then he starts raging at you and you're just like
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/545/452/342.jpg

Then the everybody from both teams starts going at it and you lose it slightly
http://24.media.tumblr.com/f415ed126e12de353f10328d4e6f171b/tumblr_mszplgCjeA1s0uq0ao5_250.gif

And then someone on your team threatens to afk and you really lose it.
http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lq4f3f9qgd1qdzza7.gif
Man my nostalgia is in full bloom... I might have to get Teen Titens on NetFlix or something.
Such a good show! I wish I had it on DVD or something :O!
Too bad they made a fucking "parody kid show" out of it :/
yeah, CN has kind of gone to crap over the past few years.

Steven Universe.
It is CN's best show as of now.
And it's really good too.
I swear Rebbecca Sugar just makes CN stay afloat
Wait, you think *that* show is a good cartoon? This is worse than I had previously realized...

Im going to end the conversation before things get heated.
I like the show and am going to end it with that.
And I dislike the show and I'll end it with that, thank you for the lovely conversation :D

Yes, perhaps we can share a spot of tea later?
Lol jk, we in NA :p
Coffee and biscuits then?
While you werent apart of the conversation, I will accept you as one of our own, and invite you to, yet, enjoy some coffee and biscuits.
but it would be silly to continue the series since it has a good ending
it ended on a cliffhanger.
Where else should it end then? :c
Well it had another season coming, but it got canceled.
I know T^T

http://www.watchcartoononline.com/anime/teen-titans

Or you could just watch it here with AdBlocker ^-^

You don't say anything in chat, but you still want to.

http://31.media.tumblr.com/11550569059c21db6ba3aa3ac5adf473/tumblr_mu8my054gv1r3p71oo5_500.gif

Even though you don't say anything in chat, you still want to say it.

http://31.media.tumblr.com/11550569059c21db6ba3aa3ac5adf473/tumblr_mu8my054gv1r3p71oo5_500.gif
There's a reason I keep practicing {{champion:50}}... Raven is my spirit animal.

Glad to see people still remember the original teen titans.
A lot of kids didn't know they were a halfway serious cartoon at one point.
A lot more people didn't realize Teen Titans was almost as long running as a full blown comic book series as the justice league is. The squad's been around a looooong time.

Lol yeah I know.
I'm glad they took some creative liberties with Starfire
Though I've got to admit Teen Titans GO! makes quite a lot of wonderful references.
Like their homage to their original outfits.

Oh my nostalgia, why you do dis to me :(

Welp time to go watch the original Teen Titans for a few days.
The new Teen Titans is good, but nowhere near the original.
"Evil beware - we have waffles!"
the cartoon butchered the real one

the cartoon doesn't exist to me

there is only the *real* Teen Titans
i wish it was still running
the funny thing is people in bronze say this
Exactly. I throw this argument on every person that spells everything wrong.
lel
